title: Full Hypothesis Test Examples
body: Suppose a consumer group suspects that the proportion of households that have three cell phones is 30%. A cell phone company has reason to believe that the proportion is not 30%. Before they start a big advertising campaign, they conduct a hypothesis test. Their marketing people survey $$150$$ households with the result that $$43$$ of the households have three cell phones.
lesson: 9.5 Additional Information and Full Hypothesis Test Examples
